The name of this device may come from a Filipino word meaning "come back"

(Sarah of the Clue Crew reports from Soweto, South Africa.)  Withmarksof government gunfire to show for it, this house of worship was a center for anti-apartheid gatherings; it's called Regina Mundi, or this "of the World" & Soweto in particular

(Kelly of the Clue Crew reports from Soweto, South Africa.)  This house on Vilakazi Street belongs tothisSouth African--the first black dean of St. Mary's Cathedral in Johannesburg is just one of his distinctions
